translations: n.赞助；保护；预兆（auspice 的复数）

phrs.translation: 由…赞助或主办，在……保护下；在…的主持下；在…保护下

sentences.sentence: The community centre was set up under the auspices of a government initiative.
sentences.translation: 在政府的大力支持下社区中心建成了。

sentences.sentence: Here was treasure-hunting under the happiest auspices--there would not be any bothersome uncertainty as to where to dig.
sentences.translation: 这里真是找宝的好地方，到哪里去挖，一点也不麻烦。

sentences.sentence: under the auspices of the Peace Research Institute in Oslo.
sentences.translation: 在挪威奥斯陆国际和平研究所的赞助下
